me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui

Interface LevelMonitor.LevelReporter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaintCan
    Enclosing class:
    LevelMonitor

    public static interface LevelMonitor.LevelReporter
    Represents a block that can report a level for some attribute.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLevel()
      Get the level of the quantity being monitored.
      Material getLevelIcon()
      Get the item used to represent the level.
      String getLevelMessage()
      Get the string to display as the monitor icon's tooltip.
      int getLevelMonitorSlot()
      Get the GUI slot in which the monitor icon should be shown.
      int getMaxLevel()
      Get the maximum possible level for the quantity being monitored.

    • Method Detail

      • getLevel

        int getLevel()
        Get the level of the quantity being monitored.
        Returns:
        an integer level

      • getMaxLevel

        int getMaxLevel()
        Get the maximum possible level for the quantity being monitored.
        Returns:
        an integer level

      • getLevelIcon

        Material getLevelIcon()
        Get the item used to represent the level. This item should support a durability bar (e.g. a tool or armour item).
        Returns:
        the item used to show the level as a durability bar

      • getLevelMonitorSlot

        int getLevelMonitorSlot()
        Get the GUI slot in which the monitor icon should be shown.
        Returns:
        a gui slot number

      • getLevelMessage

        String getLevelMessage()
        Get the string to display as the monitor icon's tooltip.
        Returns:
        a message string
